attributes.action: Get people off the roads and out of the air by making public transport irresistible!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Road pricing will put up road travel costs but it wont discourage road use because there are no good alternatives. The government need to make the case for direct spending on rail expansion, tunnel deepening, double deck trains, discounted fairs and new journey options. This is the only environmentally sensible option. Bite the bullet!
